topic.title: incomprehensible moronic trash in the media
topic.body:
one of the main reasons i have stopped watching tv more than 20 years ago was because it is filled with absolute dumb moronic crap. same goes for clearnet sites - 99,9% of the clearnet sites are dead to me.

here's some realistic examples

- Prince Harry accidentally farted while giving an interview
- Justin Bieber is now dating YouTubes famous Makeup Kelly
- Brad Pitt slipped on a banana peel and broke his hand

topic.title: what is the point of muting trolls when it takes them 25 seconds to get a new id?

1568112876_1M6Q7qRmEakfzdS5BA54WZs9Zksxo.body:
> [petrina](#comment_18_1GFU4qAMTFnQJ7W7r98Zj2xJWq1evoN7Fz): So you are either dumb, lazy or poor (probably all of these), because there is a simple fix for that.

i'm literally dying to hear it

> [petrina](#comment_19_1GFU4qAMTFnQJ7W7r98Zj2xJWq1evoN7Fz): Just die already, I have no use for you.

boomshakalaka

1568118783_1M6Q7qRmEakfzdS5BA54WZs9Zksxo.body:
> [petrina](#comment_20_1GFU4qAMTFnQJ7W7r98Zj2xJWq1evoN7Fz): What is the point of having a brain if you can't think for yourself?

Can you can a can as a canner can can a can?

> [sperg](#comment_4_19WVEMLEDso1JfM3bnHXsjHVEQ1dr3VpvQ): Would be nice to have a more "civilized" forum that was less appealing to trolls for those that want that. [...]

as long as they can get new ids so fast and easy trolling will continue to rise
